name: Projectile party - Prototype
description:
I've spent my 2022 learning gamedev from pretty much zero, and that's what I've come up with so far!

It's a Gunbound clone, a turn-based artillery game where you take into account physics and wind to launch a shot and defeat the other team.

It's pretty basic at the moment, but I intend on keep expanding it next year. Suggestions and bug reports are super welcome!

Have fun c:
